reviews.review: Portal 2 is A very good game. Allows multiplayer and Steam workshop.
fun
Very fun

Valve has done a great job making the sequel to a short puzzle game. The graphics are great for a game that's mostly considered old by now. The humor is one of the best parts of the game. Every character has amazing personality. Even the panels that are used to build the chambers have personality. In several chambers they can be seen acting almost frustrated or proud. When Wheatley is affected by GLaDOS's body, the panels look like they become angry, even though the only thing that changes is the color of their lights.

Overall great game. I have played it several times all the way through.

Builds up a lot on the first game. Visually it looks amazing, the story is much more immersive and there's even more secrets to find. The coop campaign is also pretty fun to do with a friend and troll each other. And the community maps can be really creative and fun.
Just a classic of a puzzle game, still looks good for a game that came out in 2001.

Amazing game

Po sukcesie pierwszej części pojawił się Portal 2, gra, która wyciąga to co podobało się nam w jedynce i wznosi je na wyższy level. Świetny sukcesor, momentami zabawny, zawsze wciągający. A jeśli ma się z kim pograć, to warto skusić się na co-opa, który oferuje więcej niż "to samo co solo, ale z kimś". Po sieci albo na dzielonym ekranie czekają na nas całkiem nowe poziomy i nowe zagadki. Solo i co-op to prawie jak dwie gry w jednej. Myślę, że Portal 2 to jazda obowiązkowa dla każdego.
co-op is sooooo funky

Is this not the best game ever?
The characters are great, the puzzles are great, level progression is seamless. The changing design styles to reflect the different decades as you progress through the 'old' chambers is fantastic.
My sole complaint is that there will never be a Portal 3.

Portal 2 классика от Valve проходил её бесчисленное количество раз, шикарное продолжение, головоломок от первого лица дополненных сетевым режимом. Не смотря на всё-таки однообразный геймплей, игра сама по себе динамична, и подкидывает новые сюрпризы!

포탈은 fps와 퍼즐을 합친 게임이다. 스토리도 1편 2편을 모두 해보는 것도 추천하겠습니다. 그러나 밸브의 고질병 중 하나인 3편을 내놓고 있지 않다는게 흠입니다. 제발 3편좀......
This is TOTALLY AWESOME for a $10 game it's worth it, I tell you.

Great puzzles and gameplay. My only gripe is that they removed controller support from the game and it relies solely on Steam controller settings, which are difficult to change. You can't change your controller to inverted or change look sensitivity without completely reformatting a Steam controller setting. This is honestly one of the stupidest moves any game could make. Like, you had controller support for the game back in 2015, but then the developers decided to get rid of controller support!?! Seriously WTF!!!
